title: Fixes for API < 19
message:
Fixes for API < 19

- StandardCharsets was not available < 19
- Also I noticed the surface was being cropped at 1280x720
  I decreased the size to 960x540. This means less crispiness
  but it solved the problem.

title: Make enemy "timeout" independent of system time
message:
Make enemy "timeout" independent of system time

This allows for pausing during the game but ties the ticker speed
to the game rate. This is an acceptable tradeoff at the moment.

with LinkedList.

title: First stab at a game engine
message:
First stab at a game engine

- introduced GameState (currently only one - PlayState)
- introduced GameEvent (simple enum, currently just keyboard events)
- implemented drawing in a semi-crossplatform way

Currently the naming is rather messy and the name conflicts are bad.
I'll try to switch to OpenGL asap, which should (among other things)
reduce some of that.
